name: B - Natalia Barret
_source: speak;Barret; Turning on me now, eh?{w} And you were soiling your knickers just a moment ago!
speak;Natalia; I didn't have the strength to avenge my sisters before.{w} Now, though...
speak;Barret; These do-gooders?{w} Fine then.{w} I'll bury your bones in the same dung heap as theirs.
